model.name: export
model.title: Export
model.description: Used for export a service using Spring Remoting to hide the network call using an interface.
model.label: spring,configuration

uri.description: Camel endpoint uri to use a remote transport when calling the service

serviceRef.description: Reference to the service name to lookup in the registry.

method.description: Name of method to invoke on service

serviceInterface.description: Java interfaces to use as facade for the service to be exported

camelContextId.description: The id of the CamelContext to use, if there is multiple CamelContext in the same JVM.
